item.description:
Huyen won a Pour House after work VIP party and she kindly invited our group members (must be 21+).

This party coincides with our Tuesday night promotion in November--CHIPS, DIPS AND SIPS! Every Tuesday night we turn our downstairs bar into a party lounge for VIP parties only. The Pour House will provide a complimentary buffet of yummy dips that could range from 7-layer to spinach, chili con queso to Irish Nachos with a variety of plenty of tortilla chips, potato chips, pretzrls, etc. The buffet is from 6-8pm being refilled on a need to basis. We will also have BEER TRIVIA QUESTIONS to win Pour House giftcards.


You're party will consist of the following:
•A roped off section for your group
•Welcome gifts upon arrival
•Access to The Chips and Dips buffet from 6-8pm
•Chances to win Pour House giftcards

*As always update you RSVP if your plans change. For a chance to win this party again, bring your business card and drop it in a box located at the bottom of the stairs.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: After work - VIP party
